titles.title: I was made to praise You,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I was made to praise You,
I was made to glorify Your name,
In every circumstance
To find a chance to thank You,
I was made to love You,
I was made to worship at Your throne
And to obey You,
I was made for You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
- Hecho fui para alabarte,
- Hecho fui para glorificarte,
- En toda situaci√≥n
- Y agradecerte,
- Hecho fui para amarte,
- Hecho fui para adorarte, Dios,
- Y para obedecerte,
- Hecho para Ti.
